text:
I’ve been following you on Twesta,
Hinana-san…!

The photo you uploaded yesterday… You looked so
adorable eating that triple stack of pancakes…

Your smile is so infectious,
it makes me feel happy just looking at it.

Thank you.
Hearing that makes me happy too.

Oh, no, no!
I just enjoy following you!

So, have you gotten more job offers through Twesta?
Is that even possible?

Yes~
I do get contacted through DMs sometimes~

Of course. Seeing your smile must
make people want to work with you…!

Aha~ I get to wear cute clothes,
so it's a lot of fun for me~
